name: Money Button
description:
This is a simple clicker game made by me and my friend.

To gain money click/tap the button (or press A on gamepad), to increase the amount of money gained, click/tap the "Upgrade The Money Gave By Button" (or press B on the gamepad) if you have the required amount of money, click/tap the "Rebirth" button (or press X on the gamepad) to restart (reset only money) if you gave the right amount of money and click/tap the clip that randomly passes on the screen (or press Y on the gamepad when it's on the screen) to gain 100 money.

This game was programed by me and the sprites where made by my friend.

We hope you enjoy!
